attributes.action: Bungalows for the Disabled NOT for the able bodied
attributes.additional_details:
Far too many able bodied people are living in Social Housing bungalows whilst the disabled or the infirm are left struggling in properties that are unsuitable for their needs. Needing to apply for Government funding via DFG's, costing the State millions. But IF all local authorities & the government were to take back these bungalows from "Able bodied tenants" whom DO NOT need them, give the "Disabled & the Infirm" the bungalows that they so Desperately Need & re-house these Able Bodied Tenants in the EMPTY General Needs Housing given up by the Disabled & Infirm, The money saved from the non applications for DFG's could be best spent on something more constructive in this country.
GIVE BUNGALOWS TO THOSE WHO REALLY NEED THEM
